CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.name: HRV_SDNN
CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.why_included: Captures total HRV across the full window. Reflects combined sympathetic+parasympathetic activity.
CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.importance_in_emotion_detection: Detects general arousal level; drops significantly in stress, fear, high cognitive load.

CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.name: HRV_RMSSD
CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.why_included: Direct marker of vagal (parasympathetic) activity. Captures fast beat-to-beat variation.
CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.importance_in_emotion_detection: Strongly correlates with relaxation vs stress. Reliable indicator of calmness and positive valence.

CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.name: HRV_pNN50
CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.why_included: Measures proportion of large RR differences. Another vagal activity marker.
CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.importance_in_emotion_detection: Good discriminator between relaxed/positive states vs stress/anxiety.

CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.name: HRV_MeanNN
CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.why_included: Average RR interval. Inversely tied to mean heart rate.
CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.importance_in_emotion_detection: Tracks baseline activation (sympathetic vs parasympathetic). Stress → shorter RR.

CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.name: HRV_HF
CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.importance_in_emotion_detection: Very sensitive to calmness, comfort, social engagement, positive affect.

CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.name: HRV_LF
CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.why_included: Reflects mixed sympathetic–parasympathetic dynamics; captures slower oscillations.
CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.importance_in_emotion_detection: Useful for detecting arousal and sustained cognitive/emotional load.

CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.name: HRV_LFHF
CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.why_included: Balance index between sympathetic and parasympathetic activity.
CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.importance_in_emotion_detection: One of the strongest stress/arousal markers; reliably increases during anger, fear, anxiety.

CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.name: HRV_TP
CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.why_included: Total spectral power across all bands.
CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.importance_in_emotion_detection: General indicator of autonomic flexibility; lower TP → emotional suppression, high stress.

CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.name: HRV_SampEn
CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.importance_in_emotion_detection: Drops sharply during stress, anxiety, and high arousal. Strong marker of emotional dysregulation.

CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.name: HRV_ApEn
CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.why_included: Older but complementary complexity measure to SampEn.
CORE_HRV_Emotion_Features.importance_in_emotion_detection: Useful for identifying transitions between emotional states; complexity falls during stress.
